message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.IT, cs.SY 

This paper deals with online convex optimization, which is a topic in machine learning and optimization. The use of adaptive algorithms and regret as a performance measure suggests that it belongs to the sub-category of machine learning (cs.LG). The paper also mentions exploiting smoothness, which is a common technique in optimization (cs.DS). Additionally, the use of regret as a performance measure suggests that it may also belong to the sub-categories of information theory (cs.IT) and control systems (cs.SY). Finally, the mention of "adaptive" algorithms suggests that it may also belong to the sub-category of artificial intelligence (cs.AI).
